data.comment: The match is underway at Subaru Park.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for New York at Subaru Park.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Rubiel Vazquez awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In the minute 5, At Subaru Park, Philadelphia are penalized for being offside.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tim Parker for New York who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Tim Parker is back on the pitch.
In the minute 7, Rubiel Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for New York in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 12, Philadelphia push upfield but Rubiel Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
New York's Daniel Royer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 14, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Free kick Philadelphia.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brendan Aaronson (Philadelphia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Philadelphia drive upfield and Jose Martinez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York defender.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New York close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
In the minute 21, Philadelphia are caught offside.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a New York throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a throw-in for New York, close to Philadelphia's area.
In the minute 23, Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Throw-in New York.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Kacper Przybylko gives Philadelphia a 1-0 lead in Chester.
That's a fine assist from Raymon Gaddis.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for New York in Chester.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of New York.
In the minute 35, Philadelphia drives forward and Alejandro Bedoya gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York.
In the minute 36, Philadelphia's Raymon Gaddis has been booked in Chester.
Philadelphia needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Philadelphia throw-in in New York's half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 40, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Philadelphia advance rapidly upfield but Rubiel Vazquez blows for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Brian White (New York) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rubiel Vazquez waits before resuming play because Raymon Gaddis for Philadelphia is still down.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 44, New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Raymon Gaddis has recovered and rejoins the match in Chester.
New York have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Philadelphia defence as Tim Parker fires in a strike for New York.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 45, Free kick New York.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Philadelphia throw-in in New York's half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia's Kacper Przybylko gets in a shot on goal at Subaru Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Subaru Park.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of New York.
The away team have replaced Jared Stroud with Kaku. This is the second substitution made today by Chris Armas.
In the minute 46, Tom Barlow is replacing Brian White for the away team.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
In the minute 49, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 52, Jamiro Monteiro for Philadelphia has been booked by Rubiel Vazquez and receives a first yellow card.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Philadelphia needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Cristian Casseres Jr for New York drives towards goal at Subaru Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Philadelphia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 55, New York to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to New York's area.
Jim Curtin is making the team's first substitution at Subaru Park with Sergio Santos replacing Andrew Wooten.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for New York at Subaru Park.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
In the minute 61, In Chester New York drive forward through Tom Barlow. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New York's Kaku breaks free at Subaru Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
In Chester, Philadelphia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Philadelphia pushes forward through Sergio Santos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kacper Przybylko of Philadelphia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, Rubiel Vazquez awards New York a goal kick.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of New York.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 72, Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
The away team replace Daniel Royer with Florian Valot.
New York make their fourth substitution with Mathias Jorgensen replacing Sean Davis.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Jakob Glesnes with Jack Elliott.
Ilsinho is on a sub for Brendan Aaronson for Philadelphia.
New York have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 75, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New York's Kaku gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Philadelphia defender.
In the minute 78, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Philadelphia make their fourth substitution with Warren Creavalle replacing Jose Martinez.
Sergio Santos (Philadelphia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
New York have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Omir Fernandez is replacing Marc Rzatkowski for the away team.
In the minute 81, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a New York throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
In the minute 83, Rubiel Vazquez awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
New York to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for New York in the half of Philadelphia.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick New York.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
New York will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Philadelphia.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Jamiro Monteiro for Philadelphia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
New York have a goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for New York in Chester.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York just outside Philadelphia's area.
Rubiel Vazquez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
